sentences.sContent: The armed forces have launched offensives to recapture lost ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: The armed forces have launched offensives to recapture lost ground.
sentences.sCn: 这支武装部队已发动进攻要夺回失去的阵地。

sentences.sContent: In view of architectural position all in all, exceeding and war-weary German officer those gets · card favour (Shu Man acts the role of Thoms Clay) act under orders to recapture this foothold.
sentences.sContent_eng: In view of architectural position all in all, exceeding and war-weary German officer those gets · card favour (Shu Man acts the role of Thoms Clay) act under orders to recapture this foothold.
sentences.sCn: 鉴于建筑的位置极其重要，极度厌战的德国军官彼得·卡恩（托马斯·克莱舒曼饰）奉命夺回该据点。

synos.tran: 夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历
夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收

remMethod.val: re (重新) + capture (捕获； 占领) → 重新占领 → 取回, 夺回
